page.title: 20Life in Hemlington.
page.content: My family and I live in a link detached house in Axminster Road. We have a big garden with two apple trees in it. Near my house there is a hill. Me and my friends have nicknamed it the Black hill. In my free time I often{ride}up and down the hill on my bike or roller boots. On Friday nights I go to{gymnastics}at Acklam Sports Centre. There is a big lake near the shopping centre and I sometimes ride around it on my bike. Around the lake there is a B.M.X. course and a{play {park.} There are quite a lot of grass corners where we have picnics in the summer and{snowball fights}in the winter. I think Hemlington is a good place to live in whatever the weather.
